column6: LIVING IN DARKNESS PART 4 Lured into a trap, and torn to pieces by a team of unassailable foes, the Punisher retreats in hopes of discovering the identity of his relentless pursuer. Who is this relentless pursuer?
column8: | colorist:Dan Brown | letterer:Joe Caramagna | other:Chris Eliopoulos | penciller:Mike McKone | penciller:Jerome Opena | writer:Rick Remender
